alert.note: Alert for Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 4:08PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern New Hanover and southeastern Pender Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 406 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Scotts Hill, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is also possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burgaw, Hampstead, Topsail Beach, Ashton, Rocky Point, Castle Hayne, Bayshore, Scotts Hill, Ogden, Porters Neck, Woodside and St. Helena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, then consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender
